title: Introduction｜簡介
summary_en: Natural Coin is a new philosophy of money built on circulation, decay, and resonance. It aims to prevent monopoly, reduce hoarding, and reward invisible contributions such as care, education, and environmental stewardship.
summary_cn: 自然幣是一種全新的貨幣哲學，以循環、腐敗、共振為核心。它旨在防止壟斷、抑制囤積，並回報不可見的社會貢獻，例如照顧、教育與環境保護。

title: Chapter 2｜Introduction to Natural Coin: Flow and Decay
